channel.title: Compiler probs that led me to haveing runsever.bat to fail help!
channel.description:
ok my porblem is that my compiler will never run with my java..[code]::port: ::43594 ::Running using JDK 1.6.01... 'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, opreable program or batch file. Failed! Need JDK 1.6.0_xx Press any key to continue...[/code]
now i've tryed updateing my java but then when i updated my runserver.bat now just comes up for a second and won't turn my server on what do i do??[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 13, 2008, 12:00:12 am[/size][hr]i've done "classpath" and "path" thing.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 13, 2008, 12:02:45 am[/size][hr]sorry i ment update my java then when i run my runserver.bat it flashes and doesn't turn my server on

item.title: Compiler probs that led me to haveing runsever.bat to fail help!
item.dc:creator: @Darkness_Pk Darkness Pk
item.description:
@Darkness_Pk wrote:

Which Java update do you have if like 6.7
in your classpath it will say something like this:

6_0_10

Change the 10 to yours

Also if ::port: ::43594 ::Running using JDK 1.6.01... 'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, opreable program or batch file. Failed! Need JDK 1.6.0_xx Press any key to continue...
Right click on the .bat than choose edit and change the 1.6.01 to your version.

Read full topic
item.source: Compiler probs that led me to haveing runsever.bat to fail help!
